text: Jab inn kay samney humaray kalaam ki khulli hui aayaton ki tilawat ki jati hai to aap kafiron kay chehron per na khushi kay saaf aasaar pehchan letay hain. Woh to qareeb hotay hain kay humari aayaten sunaney walon per hamla ker bethen keh dijiye kay kiya mein tumhen iss say bhi ziyada bad tar khabar doon. Woh aag hai jiss ka wada Allah ney kafiron say ker rakha hai aur woh boht hi buri jagah hai
